#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int m = 1000000007;

long long int power(int a , int n)
 {
 	if(n == 0)
 	 return 1;
 	 
    if(n == 1)
 	 return a;
 	
 	long long int halfn = power(a , n/2);
 	if(n % 2 == 0)
 	 {
 	   return (halfn*(halfn % m ) )%m;	
	 }
	
	else
	 {
	 	return (halfn*(halfn % m ) * a )% m;
	 }
 }
 

int main()
 {
 	int t;
 	cin>>t;
 	
 	while(t--)
 	 {
 	   int n;
	   cin>>n;
	   long long int ans = 1;
	   
	   if(n == 0)
	    {
	      cout<<"0"<<endl;	
		}	
	   else if(n == 1)
	    {
	      cout<<"1"<<endl;
		}
	   else if(n == 2)
	    {
	      cout<<"2"<<endl;
		}
	   else if(n == 3)
	    {
	      cout<<"3"<<endl;
		}
	   else
	    {
	      int k = n %3 ;
	      int quo ; 
	      if(k == 1)
	       {
	       	    quo = (n-4) / 3;
	       	    ans = (4 * (power(3 ,quo ) % m ) ) % m;
		   }
		  else if(k == 2)
		   {
		   	    quo = (n - 2)/3;
		   	    ans  =  (2 * ( power( 3 , quo) % m )) % m;
		   }
		  else
		   {
		   	    quo = n/3;
		   	    ans = (power (3 , quo) % m) % m ;
		   }
		   
		   cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
	   
	   
	 }
 	return 0;
 }
